name: STAY WARM (Jo Haynes Games)
description:
A small and quite janky survival / tower defence game with a focus on staying warm made for the 2022 UNC Winter Break Jam.

I ended up running out of time so there is a severe lack of sound effects in the game (I spent too long on the music lol)

Hope you enjoy playing and please do let me know what you think!

Known Issues that I didn't have time to fix:

  • If you click on a building button while trying to build a building, the building is placed next to the button.
  • Small clicks in audio when they first play.
  • Entire game audio may not work when starting a second attempt (You may have to reboot the game sorry!)
  • Enemies overlap each other sometimes.
  • Harvest cursor still shows for chopped down trees.

I may try and fix up these issues at a later date so please let me know any other bugs you find!
